channel.title: Writing Section of Moparisthebest is Dead
channel.description:
Not that many members come to this section of the forum. I tried making people more active in writing and reading, but have been unsuccessful. :( I will still try to make members more active in this section.
Thanks for taking time to read this.
~Leader

item.title: Writing Section of Moparisthebest is Dead
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“leader, post:17, topic:16904”][quote author=wall of fir link=topic=25321.msg492163#msg492163 date=1164046672]

The thing is. Most kids now do not read and don’t want to. And definitely don’t like to write.

I like to read mostly, but I really hate writing. And that’s just on top of what sppt said. So this section will most likely always be slow. Except for the occasional review on movies/books.

That and that its way at the bottom of the forums, everyone is scrolling down and either see something they like, or are bored. I dont think any part of this forum is boring!!
[/quote]

Dude, make your signature smaller.[/quote]
Yeah I was just about the say that. A sig shouldn’t take up my entire screen, it should be no more then 5 lines of unformated text.

Read full topic
item.source: Writing Section of Moparisthebest is Dead
